thread.section_title: PRTG Network Monitor Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von PRTG Network Monitor | paessler.com
thread.title: Adam Mantle
thread.title_full: PRTG Network Monitor bewertet von Adam Mantle

author: Adam Mantle
title: Adam Mantle
text:
We are a small/medium business and the free version suits our needs just perfectly. I’m a huge fan of PRTG, it completes my Net Ops setup. I’ve been using PRTG for almost a year to some capacity.
Deployment is very easy and straight forward.
Capturing Netflows from our Firewall is what brought me to PRTG, but the reporting, Qos Sensor, Alerts and Infrastructure Monitoring keeps us coming back.
I'd recommend PRTG Network Monitor to anyone.
Adam
